response.explain: The previous action code failed because the brisket was inside the fridge and the fridge was closed. The robot needs to open the fridge before it can grasp the brisket.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge.
(2) Grasp the brisket from the fridge.
(3) Cook the brisket.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    fridge = registry(env,"fridge_dszchb_0")
    open(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
